name: Luna's Nightmare Mobile V1.0
description:
This is the new version of Luna's Nightmare on Android devices.

This game is in active development and is going to change drastically over time.  All proceeds will go to game improvements.

Patch Notes since last version

*RPG stat menu between waves

*Enemy speed and health scales with waves

*Explosions are now multi colored

*Shield power up

*Power ups now drop from fallen enemies

*Large zombies now drop multiple bombs

*Improved UI

*Improved visuals

*More voice acting from Luna herself

*many more boring things
